name: songs-by-artist
description: Webapp that displays all songs for a given artist.

scripts.prestart: npm run build && cd client && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir dist/client dist/client/build && cp -rf client/build dist/client
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build

author: Nafeu Nasir <nafeu.nasir@gmail.com> (http://nafeu.com/)
